title: X-Men - Curse of the Mutants - Complete (2010-2011)
description:
Stumbled across this arc by accident and really enjoyed it. None of the so called "complete" torrents on here are actually complete so hence the upload. Namor plays a big role in this story and it really gets in to the history of Atlantis more than you would expectÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and yes, it's about vampires.
